title: The Destroyer - Remo Williams comics
description:
For fans of the mens action book series - The Destroyer. Here are the comic books and magazine style comics.  These were put out by Marvel Comics in the early 1990's.  Thanks to other who scanned and made the effort to archive these comics.  Hat tip to Digital Comic Preservation group and the Marvel Chronology project for hosting these comics in the past.

Include in the torrent are 
- 9 magazine style black & white comics
- 4 part comic series 
- 1 one shot comic.


About the Destroyer series - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Destroyer_(fiction)
About the comics - http://www.sinanju.com/comics.htm

These are just the COMICS!   The books are not included.  They can be found in other torrents on the web.   But help support the author(s)and consider buying the books
